full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'GO BA'I LHA LNGA LHAN SKYES PHRAG LHA RTA MCHOG TSE THAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PA 'DI NI PHRAG LHA LA TSE THAR RTEN DU LUG 'BUL BA LA, RTA SNGON RTEN 'BUL GYI CHOG BCAD GYI LING YID 'ONG SNGON PO'I MDOG ,ZHES SOGS KYI RTZUN TSIG 'UR SGRA CHE BA'I BRJOD DE LUG 'BUL BA NI ZHU DPES LHUM 'GENGS PA LTAR LAS CUNG ZAD MCHOG TU SNYAN DU BSAM TE BA NI BAN RGAN BSAM GTAN GYIS PHRAL DU BRIS SO, ,BYANG BUR BRIS PA'I 'DOD GSOL GYI NANG DU RTA MCHOG ZHES PA'I TSAB DU LUG MCHOG ZHES BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
